overview: These women are in for a very long night! This 70’s vintage film features intense bondage practices on these delightful beauties and it’s going to go all night for them!  Rough sex auteur director, Joe Davian, delivers a straight faced black magic story. New York reporters investigate the bizarre sex rituals of an underground voodoo cult. Wall to wall graphic orgies, up close whip wounds, and crucifixion!
tagline: A Powerful Story of Bondage, Domination and Humiliation
title: The Night of Submission
